mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNTS(AC_NUMBER, AC_EMAIL, AC_NAME, AC_PW, AC_JOB, AC_FIELD, AC_INTEREST, AC_INDEX, AC_SENDEMAIL) VALUES(ACCOUNTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ac_email}, #{ac_name}, #{ac_pw}, #{ac_job}, #{ac_field}, #{ac_interest}, #{ac_index}, #{ac_sendemail} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ACCOUNTS WHERE AC_EMAIL = #{ac_email} AND AC_PW = #{ac_pw}
